QuestData.Title: Breaking Broketooth
QuestData.Description: Hozen only ravage when they think their supplies are too few for their number of mouths.$b$bProblem is, hozen always have more mouths than food.$b$bWe have very few grummles these days.$b$bIt is a hard thing to ask, but can you be a friend to grummles, and destroy some of the Broketooth hozen south of here? It is the only way to prevent them from destroying the landscape.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Broketooth Chargers and 6 Broketooth Tossers.
QuestData.CompletionText: This is not vengeance or fortune, it is survival.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $p! Hopefully that will slow the Broketooth ravage.
